duties_responsibilities.duty: Delivery of parts to commercial customers and assist with task and inventory processes.
Support DIY business, achieve sales and service objectives, source from stores, hubs, pdq, and external suppliers.
Support advanced functions of the DIY business, source from numerous places, trouble shooting, and project assistance for DIY customers.
Support advanced functions for both DIY and DIFM, trouble shooting, and project assistance for DIY/DIFM customers.
Support basic and advance functions on DIY and professional business, maintain company standards around operating and product processes.
